cantilever_beam_distributed_load.png.description: Cantilever beam with distributed load, showing fixed support at left end and distributed load arrows along the top surface

cantilever_beam_ea_stiffness.png.description: Simple cantilever beam diagram with distributed load arrows and fixed support, labeled with EA and length l

beam_variable_stiffness_distributed_poin.description: Beam with variable stiffness EA(x) subjected to distributed load and concentrated force P at the end, showing coordinate system

simply_supported_beam_uniform_load.png.description: Simply supported beam with uniform distributed load q shown by arrows along the top, with supports at both ends and length l

simply_supported_beam_basic.png.description: Simply supported beam diagram showing supports at both ends with length l marked

beam_midpoint_load_mixed_supports.png.description: Beam with point load P at midpoint, showing fixed support at left and simple support at right, with length dimensions l/2 marked

beam_two_segments_point_load.png.description: Beam diagram showing two segments with point load P, fixed support at left, simple support at right, with coordinate system and segment lengths marked

moment_shear_convergence_plots.png.description: Two graphs showing bending moment Mx and shear force Q distributions along beam length, with curves for different N values (N=1,2,3,5) compared to exact solution

moment_shear_convergence_n1_n3.png.description: Two graphs showing bending moment Mx and shear force Q distributions with convergence curves for N=1 and N=3 compared to exact solution

cantilever_beam_sketch.png.description: Simple cantilever beam sketch showing horizontal beam with fixed support at left end

fixed_simply_supported_beam.png.description: Fixed-simply supported beam showing fixed support at left and simple support at right

simply_supported_beam_diagram.png.description: Simply supported beam with supports at both ends

cantilever_beam_fixed_support.png.description: Cantilever beam showing fixed support at left end with horizontal orientation

simply_supported_pin_supports.png.description: Simply supported beam with pin supports at both ends

rectangular_plate_coordinate_system.png.description: Rectangular plate diagram showing coordinate system with x and y axes, dimensions a and b marked, representing a thin plate element

plate_boundary_conditions_comparison.png.description: Three rectangular plate diagrams showing different boundary conditions: free edges, clamped edges, and simply supported edges, with coordinate systems and dimensions marked
